About Me

Hi, my name’s Uriel and I’m a SDET. As well as an SDET I also have experience making web and mobile apps. I have extensive experience implementing QA processes from scratch, CI/CD , and Agile methodologies.

I am mainly skilled in: Web Development, Test automation, Cloud infrastructure and Quality processes.
